accept

public void accept(java.lang.String systemId)
            throws PDUStringException,
                   java.lang.IllegalStateException,
                   java.io.IOException
Accept the bind request. Will not send the optional parameter sc_interface_version in the bind response message.

Parameters:
systemId - is the system identifier that will be send to ESME.
Throws:
PDUStringException - if the system id is not valid.
java.lang.IllegalStateException - if the acceptance or rejection has been made.
java.io.IOException - is the connection already closed.
See Also:
#reject(ProcessRequestException)

accept

public void accept(java.lang.String systemId,
                   InterfaceVersion interfaceVersion)
            throws PDUStringException,
                   java.lang.IllegalStateException,
                   java.io.IOException
Accept the bind request. The provided interface version will be put into the optional parameter sc_interface_version in the bind response message.

Parameters:
systemId - is the system identifier that will be send to ESME.
interfaceVersion - is the interface version that will be sent to the ESME
Throws:
PDUStringException - if the system id is not valid.
java.lang.IllegalStateException - if the acceptance or rejection has been made.
java.io.IOException - is the connection already closed.
See Also:
#reject(ProcessRequestException)

reject

public void reject(int errorCode)
            throws java.lang.IllegalStateException,
                   java.io.IOException
Reject the bind request.

Parameters:
errorCode - is the reason of rejection.
Throws:
java.lang.IllegalStateException - if the acceptance or rejection has been made.
java.io.IOException - if the connection already closed.
See Also:
#accept()}
